title: Interior of the Temple of Bacchus, Baalbek, Syria
medium: Brush and oil paint, graphite on cardboard
description: The lower parts of two bays and the separating columns of one long side are shown.  Parts of the entablature and a capital lie in the foreground.  The brownish grounding color is shown laterally and at the bottom.  In the upper left corner: figures and a small plan.
name: Drawing
